# These structures are those generated by the "extract_model0.sh" script in the
# "pyinteraph2" folder inside each system's folder in "simulations_analysis".

# They correspond to the first frame of each trajectory.

cp ../../simulations_analysis/free/2lpc_1-169/replicate1/CHARMM22star_TIP3P/md/psn/pyinteraph2/model0.pdb ./bclxl_free_replicate1.pdb
cp ../../simulations_analysis/free/2lpc_1-169/replicate3/CHARMM22star_TIP3P/md/psn/pyinteraph2/model0.pdb ./bclxl_free_replicate3.pdb
cp ../../simulations_analysis/beclin1/2PON_1-156_21-43/replicate1/CHARMM22star_TIP3P/md/psn/pyinteraph2/model0.pdb ./bclxl_beclin1_replicate1.pdb
cp ../../simulations_analysis/beclin1/2PON_1-156_21-43/replicate2/CHARMM22star_TIP3P/md/psn/pyinteraph2/model0.pdb ./bclxl_beclin1_replicate2.pdb

# *_processed.pdb structures have been either renumbered or chainized or both, and are the ones used for the analyses.
# process_*.sh scripts are those that have been run to perform the processing.

# Summary of the processing:
# - bclxl_free_replicate1.pdb -> chain A assigned to all atoms -> bclxl_free_replicate1_processed.pdb 
# - bclxl_free_replicate3.pdb -> chain A assigned to all atoms -> bclxl_free_replicate3_processed.pdb
# - bclxl_beclin1_replicate1.pdb -> chain A and B swapped so that Bcl-xL is chain A and Beclin-1 is chain B;
#				    chain B renumbered 106-128 according to the UniProt numbering of Beclin-1
#				    (Q14457) -> bclxl_beclin1_replicate1_processed.pdb
# - bclxl_beclin1_replicate2.pdb -> chain A and B swapped so that Bcl-xL is chain A and Beclin-1 is chain B;
#				    chain B renumbered 106-128  according to the UniProt numbering of Beclin-1
#				    (Q14457) -> bclxl_beclin1_replicate2_processed.pdb

sh process_bclxl_free_replicate1.sh
sh process_bclxl_free_replicate3.sh
sh process_bclxl_beclin1_replicate1.sh
sh process_bclxl_beclin1_replicate3.sh
